One developer + AI

A one-man shop that
doesn't build like one.

Wemble is a software company built around a simple bet: one developer with the right AI tools can ship what used to take a team. We build products, contribute to open source, and prove it every day.

How one person ships like a team

Wemble isn't a typical software company. There's no team of 12. No project managers. No Jira board (thank god).

It's one developer with AI agents that handle research, write code, monitor production, and draft blog posts. The same AI that powers our products also helps build them. We're not just using AI ‚Äî we're proving what's possible when you lean all the way in.

Every product on this site was built this way. Every blog post, every open source contribution. If you're curious what that looks like in practice, read the blog or browse the code.
